summary: Yunong Xiao of Netflix discusses several strategies on logging for Node.js Applications
Tim Caswell of Rackspace shows us some intriguing uses for ES6 Generators.
David East of Google walks us through some basic code demos and terminology for Angular.js 2.0 code.
Stephen Fluin quickly runs down use-cases and guidelines for building mobile applications as Chrome Cordova Apps.
Uri Goldshtein gives an enthusiastic talk on using angular-meteor and demos a basic "party" application.
Jafar Husain and Michael Paulson of Netflix show off Falcor, an innovative data access layer which challenges traditional MVC architecture.
